kindred.client.model

Class Map

  • Object
    • kindred.client.model.Map

  • public class Map
extends Object
    Handles events related to a Map in the Game. A Map is divided into many Tiles.
    Author:
    Kindred Team

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Battle battle
      Calculates results of battles between Units.
      private int numUnitsA
      Number of units that the first player has on the Map.
      private int numUnitsB
      Number of units that the second player has on the Map.
      private int tileHeight
      Graphical measurement of the height of each Tile.
      private Tile[][] tiles
      Representation of this Map as a 2x2 Tile matrix.
      private int tileWidth
      Graphical measurement of the width of each Tile.

      Constructor and Description
      Map(Tile[][] tiles, int tileHeight, int tileWidth)
      Constructs a Map and initializes Battle module.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int attack(int team, int xi, int yi, int xf, int yf)
      Makes the Unit on Tile (xi, yi) attack the Unit on Tile (xf, yf) during the specified team's turn.
      boolean causeDamage(int x, int y, int damage)
      Directly causes the specified amount of damage to the Unit on Tile (x, y) of the Map.
      int getMapHeight()
      Returns the height of this Map, i.e., the number of lines in the Tile matrix.
      int getMapWidth()
      Returns the width of this Map, i.e., the number of columns in the Tile matrix.
      int getNumUnitsA()
      Returns the remaining number of Units that player A has on the Map.
      int getNumUnitsB()
      Returns the remaining number of Units that player B has on the Map.
      Tile getTile(int x, int y)
      Returns the Tile on position (x, y).
      int getTileHeight()
      Returns the height of a Tile in pixels (used by GUI).
      String getTileInfo(int x, int y)
      Returns a String containing information about the Unit and Terrain on Tile (x, y).
      int getTileWidth()
      Returns the width of a Tile in pixels (used by GUI).
      boolean move(int team, int xi, int yi, int xf, int yf)
      Moves Unit from the specified team on Tile (xi, yi) to Tile (xf, yf) on this Map.
      boolean placeUnit(Unit unit, int x, int y)
      Adds a Unit to Tile (x, y) on this Map.
      boolean validPosition(int x, int y)
      Returns true if the given Tile (x, y) exists in this Map, or false otherwise.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Map

        public Map(Tile[][] tiles,
           int tileHeight,
           int tileWidth)
        Constructs a Map and initializes Battle module.
        Parameters:
        tiles - 2x2 Tile matrix. All Tiles are supposed to initially hold no Unit
        tileHeight - graphical height of each Tile
        tileWidth - graphical width of each Tile

    • Method Detail

      • validPosition

        public boolean validPosition(int x,
                             int y)
        Returns true if the given Tile (x, y) exists in this Map, or false otherwise.
        Parameters:
        x - x coordinate of the Tile to be verified
        y - y coordinate of the Tile to be verified
        Returns:
        true, if the Tile is valid, or false otherwise

      • placeUnit

        public boolean placeUnit(Unit unit,
                         int x,
                         int y)
        Adds a Unit to Tile (x, y) on this Map. Returns true if placement was successful or false otherwise.
        Parameters:
        unit - Unit to be inserted
        x - x coordinate of the Tile
        y - y coordinate of the Tile
        Returns:
        true, if placement was successful, or false otherwise

      • move

        public boolean move(int team,
                    int xi,
                    int yi,
                    int xf,
                    int yf)
        Moves Unit from the specified team on Tile (xi, yi) to Tile (xf, yf) on this Map. Supposes that all given coordinates are valid, i.e., not outside borders of this Map.

        Returns true if movement was successful or false otherwise.

        Parameters:
        team - number identifier of the player whose turn the game is currently on
        xi - x coordinate of the Unit to be moved
        yi - y coordinate of the Unit to be moved
        xf - x coordinate of the destination Tile
        yf - y coordinate of the destination Tile
        Returns:
        true, if movement was successful, or false otherwise

      • attack

        public int attack(int team,
                  int xi,
                  int yi,
                  int xf,
                  int yf)
        Makes the Unit on Tile (xi, yi) attack the Unit on Tile (xf, yf) during the specified team's turn. Returns an integer representing damage:
        • If damage = -1, then the attack missed.
        • If damage ≥ 0, then it represents the damage received by the defending Unit.
        Parameters:
        team - number identifier of the player whose turn the game is currently on
        xi - x coordinate of the attacker
        yi - y coordinate of the attacker
        xf - x coordinate of the defender
        yf - y coordinate of the defender
        Returns:
        damage received by the defending unit if the attack succeeded, or -1 otherwise

      • causeDamage

        public boolean causeDamage(int x,
                           int y,
                           int damage)
        Directly causes the specified amount of damage to the Unit on Tile (x, y) of the Map. Supposes that a Unit exists on the specified Tile. Returns true if the Unit is dead, i.e., has no more hit points left, or false otherwise.
        Parameters:
        x - x coordinate of the Unit that will take damage
        y - y coordinate of the Unit that will take damage
        damage - damage to be caused to the Unit
        Returns:
        true, if the Unit is dead, or false otherwise

      • getTile

        public Tile getTile(int x,
                    int y)
        Returns the Tile on position (x, y).
        Parameters:
        x - x coordinate of the desired Tile
        y - y coordinate of the desired Tile
        Returns:
        Tile on position (x, y)

      • getMapHeight

        public int getMapHeight()
        Returns the height of this Map, i.e., the number of lines in the Tile matrix.
        Returns:
        height of this Map

      • getMapWidth

        public int getMapWidth()
        Returns the width of this Map, i.e., the number of columns in the Tile matrix.
        Returns:
        width of this Map

      • getTileHeight

        public int getTileHeight()
        Returns the height of a Tile in pixels (used by GUI).
        Returns:
        the height of a Tile in pixels

      • getTileWidth

        public int getTileWidth()
        Returns the width of a Tile in pixels (used by GUI).
        Returns:
        the width of a Tile in pixels

      • getNumUnitsA

        public int getNumUnitsA()
        Returns the remaining number of Units that player A has on the Map.
        Returns:
        the number of Units of player A

      • getNumUnitsB

        public int getNumUnitsB()
        Returns the remaining number of Units that player B has on the Map.
        Returns:
        the number of Units of player B

      • getTileInfo

        public String getTileInfo(int x,
                          int y)
        Returns a String containing information about the Unit and Terrain on Tile (x, y).
        Parameters:
        x - x coordinate of the desired Tile
        y - y coordinate of the desired Tile
        Returns:
        a String containing information about the specified Tile
